name: get_coin_modifiers
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool coinranking.
Tool description: A simple API for Cryptocurrency Prices - 28k+ users - Real-Time & Historical - Crypto Market Data - Coins - Exchanges - Free & Paid
API description: Get the modifiers of a coin's supply and their balance.
This endpoint requires the **ultra** plan or higher.

uuid.description: The UUID of the coin for which to request the modifiers.

offset.description:
Offset. Used for pagination

Default value: 0

limit.description: Limit for pagination. Default is 50. Must be in the range 0-100.
